text: Your actions have drawn the attention of the Chaos Gods. Though they are fickle, you can perhaps direct their attention to a particular area. However, there is always a price to be paid…
Gaze upon my legions and let them bask in the Dark Gods’ blessings.
Change is always the answer. Seek to bestow upon yourself fresh gifts.
The champions under your yoke are loyal to you, and so should be rewarded.
The Dark Fortresses under your sway are ready for enhancement.
